name: Star Wars: Empire at War Gold
notes: Under "runner options" set "Strict Drawing Order" to "Enable"

script.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Star Wars - Empire At War Gold/Launch Star Wars - Empire At War.lnk

task.description: Installing Star Wars Empire at War
task.name: wineexec

content:
exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Star Wars - Empire At War Gold/Launch Star Wars - Empire At
  War.lnk
files:
- file1: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Installing Star Wars Empire at War
    executable: ${file1}
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts directx9 d3dcompiler_43 dinput8
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
task:
  arch: win32
  name: create_prefix
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
